About.title: About me
About.description: I have lived in Poland for over 8 years and independently went through the entire process from visa to Polish citizenship. Now I help foreigners move and legalize themselves in Poland. I analyze individual paths for obtaining residence permits, permanent residency, and citizenship.

Solutions.title: What problems will I help solve?
Solutions.description: These are the most common difficulties my clients face
Solutions.problem_1: Do you want to move to Poland but don't know where to start
Solutions.problem_2: Don't know which Residence Card to apply for and what documents to collect
Solutions.problem_3: Want to stay in Poland for a long time and obtain citizenship
Solutions.problem_4: Don't want to waste your time and nerves on collecting documents yourself

Workflow.title: How do I work?
Workflow.step_1_description: We conduct a consultation analyzing your situation and documents. We offer all possible options for obtaining necessary documents in the shortest time.
Workflow.step_2_description: We sign a contract and launch the process of your legalization in Poland. We register you in UZHR, fill out questionnaires, collect all necessary documents.
Workflow.step_3_description: I accompany you to UZHR, assist with further correspondence. After 3-4 months of waiting, I write letters to expedite your case. I am always available and happy to help if needed or provide any information.

Target.title: For whom is this course?
Target.perk_1_title: I Want To Do It Myself
Target.perk_1_description: If you want to legalize yourself and your family independently with minimal costs and professional knowledge
Target.perk_2_description: If you want to go through the journey from visa to obtaining Polish citizenship - the course will be a step-by-step guide!
Target.perk_3_description: If you want to start working or are already working in the field of legalization, want to increase your level of knowledge and experience, as well as increase the price for your services - this course is for you!

CoursePricing.title: Course Fees
CoursePricing.description: Choose a rate that fits your needs.
CoursePricing.plan_1_tagline: If you want to legalize yourself and your family INDEPENDENTLY with minimal expenses and professional knowledge.
CoursePricing.plan_2_tagline: If you want to start working or are already working in the field of legalization, want to enhance your knowledge and experience, as well as increase the price for your services - this course is for you!
CoursePricing.plan_3_tagline: If you want to start working or are already working in the field of legalization, want to enhance your knowledge and experience, as well as increase the price for your services - this course is for you!
CoursePricing.feature_1_footnote: Each module includes educational material on specific topics (Residence Permit, Permanent Residency, Employment, etc.)
CoursePricing.block_1_title: Block 1: Where to Start Your Path to Legalization?
CoursePricing.block_1_description: In this block, you will learn where to start your legalization process, what nuances there might be, how to choose the best option for you and your family + bonus ‚ÄúDictionary of Terms Necessary for Legalization‚Äù.
CoursePricing.block_2_title: Block 2: Legalizing Stay and Entry to Poland.
CoursePricing.block_2_description: In this block, we will talk about visas, their types, UKR status, and other documents granting the right to enter and stay in Poland.
CoursePricing.block_3_description: We will discuss employment permits, what types of contracts exist, what is starosta information, etc. + test
CoursePricing.block_4_description: Types of VNZ, grounds for obtaining VNZ, documents, and correct filling + test.
CoursePricing.block_5_description: Who can get PMJ in Poland? What is required? What are the deadlines? Documents and correct filling + Test.
CoursePricing.block_6_description: Discussing ways to obtain Polish citizenship. Which submission option to choose via President or Voivode? What to pay attention to in documents?
CoursePricing.block_7_title: Block 7: Working with Documents and Their Analysis.
CoursePricing.block_7_description: Types of administrative documents and how to work with them (Wezwanie, zawiadomienie, umorzenie, etc.)
CoursePricing.block_8_description: How to speed up the case, write an appeal, replace plastic, purpose of stay, etc.
CoursePricing.block_9_description: Discussing nuances of starting a business, difference between JDG and Sp√≥≈Çka, how to choose PKD codes and tax forms
CoursePricing.block_10_description: Where to find information on migration law. What is KPA and what norms need to be known?
